Container.Name: HandBrake
Container.Description: HandBrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs. Full gui in a RDP container accessible via browser. Use the movies mapping for loading and saving movies and link to a folder on your unraid box, the config mapping is for storing settings for handbrake.
